name: Pedalive (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
pedALIVE is our project for the 46th Ludum Dare from april 2020.

With the help of Bery (Graphic Design), Nixco (Sound Design) (and myself to the "code") we have created a prototype that ask you to ride a bicycle to keep alive the music and your avatar.

Right and Left arrows are the controls you need to press alternatively to grow your speed gauge.

Beware of the stamina, don't let it go down to 0, try to cool it down a bit by stopping pedaling
